body_html:
The reason is primarily that the directory was specified by the caller, so we should respect that :)

I don't think we want to change behavior since it breaking it would be backward incompatible.

Thanks for the suggestion though.

body:
The reason is primarily that the directory was specified by the caller, so we should respect that :)

I don't think we want to change behavior since it breaking it would be backward incompatible.

Thanks for the suggestion though.
